metadata.name: starknet-agentic
metadata.description: Starknet skills for AI agents: wallets, DeFi, identity, payments, and more
metadata.author: keep-starknet-strange

plugins.name: starknet-skills
plugins.description: Complete Starknet agent toolkit: wallet management, DeFi operations, on-chain identity, P2P payments, and anonymous transactions

plugins.name: starknet-wallet
plugins.description: Starknet wallet management with session keys and gasless transactions

plugins.name: starknet-defi
plugins.description: DeFi operations: swaps, staking, lending via avnu aggregator

plugins.name: starknet-identity
plugins.description: ERC-8004 on-chain agent identity and reputation

plugins.name: starknet-payments
plugins.description: P2P payments with QR codes and Telegram bot

plugins.name: huginn-onboard
plugins.description: Bridge to Starknet and register with Huginn registry
